summary: All previously reported security and input-validation issues have been addressed appropriately with no new blocking problems introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Service JWT verification did not restrict algorithms (JWT algorithm confusion risk)
previous_issues_status.notes: JWT verify now restricts algorithms to HS256 as suggested.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Bridge input validation incomplete for integers, EVM addresses, and numeric amountRaw
previous_issues_status.notes: Validation now enforces integer checks and address/amount formats.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: accountId query param not validated as string; limit/offset allowed negative values
previous_issues_status.notes: accountId type check added; limit/offset are clamped to non-negative values.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: TBA bind endpoint did not validate tbaAddress format
previous_issues_status.notes: tbaAddress now validated as a 20-byte EVM address.
